name: Crisis
description: Set against the backdrop of the opioid epidemic, stories of an undercover cop, a professor and a grieving mother collide.

review.author: DelveSifter
review.heading: Excellent !
review.reviewBody: This movie just pull's you in, I thought that any movie telling 4 different stories would make it confusing but it was just the opposite the stories flowed perfectly into each other and each story is excellent, enjoy

keywords: opioid crisis,opioid epidemic,opioid addiction,opioid withdrawal,drug addiction
